name: Ocean-Hued Clam
description:
When played: Heal the attached character for 2 HP.
For every 3 HP of healing your characters receive, this card accumulates 1 Sea-Dyed Foam. (Maximum of 2)
When this character deals DMG: Consume all Sea-Dyed Foam. DMG is increased by 1 for each one consumed.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
